Business with us

Become a partner with us :

Pollyanna consultancy services with universities that enjoy excellent reputations, looking for the best fit between a student and the institution. We have a wide channel of agents across India, running excellent awareness programs for students. Our process is seamless and transparent, there by winning the confidence of our aspirants and the universities from the beginning.

Become a part of ever-growing network of overseas education consultants!

Consultant

As our Partner, you will get assist in identifying growth opportunities – how to increase your student inquires as well as increasing your profit. We will help you with strategies to achieve these objectives. As our partner, you will get the benefit of attractive profit margins as well as target-based incentives

College,institution & university

We are of the firm opinion that to be a leader in our field of expertise, we also need to flex our marketing skills. From utilising both traditional and digital media for our country specific / university specific / programme specific campaigns, to on-ground conferences and dissemination of information, we utilise the full gamut of options available to reach our young aspirants. Our partner universities can be rest assured that we will not disappoint them.

What benefits you get as a partner?

11+ Offices Across India

100+ Sub-Agents

Student Assessment

Marketing Channels

Dedicated Manager

CRM Driven Processes

Know Who We Are

About our company

The most trusted overseas education consultant in India!

pollyanna consultancy services was founded with a vision to revolutionize the overseas education scenario in India. Students aspiring to study in higher education, face some hurdles in terms of getting the valuable info which can help them further their prospects as there is an ocean of information to navigate. This is where we step in, as experienced consultants having the expertise of 10+ years of helping over 10,000+ students placements. We join the dots to connect various considerable factors for students to help them fulfil their dreams of overseas education.

Quality education promotes competency of employees and also results in overall growth and advancement of the society.

Md Sajid Akhter

- Founder & M.D @ pollyanna
